short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Receive system notifications or play a sound when a download is complete or a download fails.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Download Notifier & Sounds" is a helpful little tool that will alert you to the status of your downloads. Tailor your notification preferences to hear a sound when a download completes, all downloads finish, or if a download fails. Select from various sound packs and adjust the notification volume to your liking. Choose to receive system notifications. Requires a one-time payment.

Key Features:

- Customizable Alerts: Choose which events trigger an audible alert.
- Variety of Sound Packs: Personalize your experience by selecting from a range of sound packs to suit your taste.
- Volume Control: Adjust the notification volume to match your environment or personal preference.
- System Notifications: In addition to sound alerts, receive system notifications.
